ComicInfo.Title: The Fool's Path!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Fool's Path!: Student Christine Sandt receives a strange tarot card in her mail, which she takes to her faculty advisor Katherine Reynolds. Katherine and Daimon go with her to have her tarot read by a local gypsy.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 20:07:07. [CVDB15065] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:53:32. [Issue ID 28259]
